moretraps.name: MoreTraps
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.moretraps: Adds skeleton-horse-type traps to other mobs.
fml.menu.mods.info.description.moretraps: Adds skeleton-horse-type traps to other mobs.
message.moretraps.install_yacl: Install Yet Another Config Lib to access mod options
option.moretraps.general.trapRange.toolt: Distance at which traps will activate
option.moretraps.trapGroup.sourceId.tool: The ID of the entity to trigger the trap
option.moretraps.trapGroup.spawnId.toolt: The ID of the entity spawned when the trap is activated
option.moretraps.trapGroup.passengerId.t: The ID of the entity riding the Spawn Entity (optional)
option.moretraps.trapGroup.passengerOnSo: Whether to spawn a passenger on the Source Entity
Whether to make the Source/Spawn entities ride their Passenger Entities
option.moretraps.trapGroup.chance.toolti: The chance for a spawned entity to be a trap
option.moretraps.trapGroup.spawnNum.tool: The number of entities to spawn when the trap is triggered
option.moretraps.trapGroup.effectNum.too: The sum of status effects and their amplifiers applied to trap entities when the trap is triggered
